title: Bloomberg Westminster: Only a Small Windfall
itunes:title: Bloomberg Westminster: Only a Small Windfall
description:
Mike Wood, Conservative MP for Dudley South, says a windfall tax on energy companies is worth serious consideration, but it would probably only mean £50 a year off domestic fuel bills. He tells Bloomberg's Stephen Carroll and Yuan Potts, the Government should look at uprating pensions and benefits to compensate for higher inflation. Plus: Katy Hayward, from Queen's University Belfast on the Northern Irish border and why it's such an intractable issue.
